personal_info.summary: Results-driven Business Analyst with a strong background in functional requirement gathering, system implementation, and project management. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize business processes and deliver innovative IT solutions. Experienced in Agile and Waterfall methodologies, with a proven ability to bridge the gap between business needs and technical solutions.

responsibilities: Collaborate with the development team in creating, optimizing, and implementing Al-driven solutions.
Conduct functional analysis to enhance system performance and user experience.
Engage with stakeholders to ensure smooth deployment of Al features.
Analyzed economic indicators to adjust profitability strategies.
Managed financial reports and optimized internal workflows.
Assisted in implementing new financial management tools.
Supervised collections and managed inventory optimization.
Led cross-functional teams to enhance operational efficiencies.
Developed key reporting metrics to improve decision-making processes.
Identified and tracked national and international tenders.
Provided strategic consulting for bid submissions.
Strengthened client relationships through tailored business solutions.
Supervise business unit accounts; coordinate, monitor, and control regional projects.
Prepare MDCA reports and monthly financial forecasts.
Conduct price adjustments for public works consultancies to maintain economic equilibrium, using relevant price indices.
Design and implement optimized organizational structures and processes to increase productivity.
Diagnose and analyze the operations of various departments, proposing and executing improvements in resource efficiency.
Implement corporate induction and familiarization programs.

work_experience.company: COMISION DE ADMINISTRACION DE DIVISAS CADIVI
responsibilities: Analyze foreign exchange risks, design and implementation of controls, preparation of regulatory compliance and performance reports.
Deliver training to financial operators and government agencies.
Audit and supervise the currency exchange management process at banks and currency exchange agencies.

Full Stack Web Developer - Python React Node.js
